snippet: The discovery of the virus was the first in the country since 2002, the World Health Organization said, but no newly paralyzed children or adults have been identified.
abstract: World Health Organization announces that the polio virus has been found in a sewage sample from Israel for first time since 2002, but no newly paralyzed children or adults have been identified.
lead_paragraph: The discovery of the virus was the first in the country since 2002, the World Health Organization said, but no newly paralyzed children or adults have been identified.

headline.seo: Polio Virus Discovered in Sewage From Israel
headline.main: Polio Virus Discovered in Sewage From Israel
headline.print_headline: Israel: Polio Virus Found in Sewage in City Near Egypt
